did.unittitle: Brooklyn and Long Island Autograph collection
did.abstract: The Brooklyn and Long Island autograph collection consists of autographs of many Brooklyn and Long Island residents cut from original documents.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1977.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This small collection is housed in a single folder. A portion of the autographs are stored in envelopes alphabetically by surname, with each envelope representing one letter. These seem mostly to be cut from receipts. The envelopes are stamped "Long Island Historical Society" and "Duplicate." Not all letters of the alphabet are present, however. The collection also includes loose autographs and documents.
